Daba.name: Daba
Daba.description: The Daba are at the forefront of innovation, discovering more efficient ways to grow and use their resources.

Dananu.name: Dananu
Dananu.description: A skilled and organized people, the Dananu are adept at timing their efforts for maximum gain.

Indartsu.name: Indartsu
Indartsu.description: Finding strength in numbers the Indartsu focus on expanding their tribe and thriving in this new land.

Kaha.name: Kaha
Kaha.description: Working together with ease, the Kaha can accomplish great feats as they travel far and wide.

KiaKia.name: KiaKia
KiaKia.description: The KiaKia are able to use their tactical knowledge of the land to surprise and overwhelm their foes.

Kiror.name: Kiror
Kiror.description: The Kiror are experts at taking the lay of the land, and can move their tribe around with deftness and skill.

Mukaan.name: Mukaan
Mukaan.description: The Mukaan are a sociable tribe and they are at their best (and worst) when sharing land with other tribes.

Tunga.name: Tunga
Tunga.description: An independent and fearless people, the Tunga know how to make the best of any situation.
